text: Maxine Matilpi (1956) is a Kwakwaka'wakw artist from Alert Bay, Canada. Her work is included in the collections of the Seattle Art Museum, the McCord Museum, Montreal and the Museum of Fine Arts Boston. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:20th-century American women artists Category:21st-century American women artists Category:Native American artists Category:Living people
title: Maxine Matilpi
